content.body:
The deadline for registering for the March Plenary meeting in New York is 24th Feb.  So far we have 19 sign-ups!  Please register here if you have not done so already.

content.body: Is there a list of registrations anywhere? I'm pretty sure I registered a while ago, but not 100% certain
There should be a confirmation mail to your filled email inbox, like "Thanks for filling out this form: TC39 March 2026 In-Person Registration"
